divs: sighting detailsit apeared from above. came down from the sky. then it went east to west then west to east and up and down were it would not be in site due to the distance. it was changing colors with its travels from green to white to red to blue also changing its shape from a box shape to the letter s shape to a flat sauser shape. no noise, i think it was happening close to olive ave, and i observed it from my back yard up around vogel, it was silent, it was about 1:30 am, just got home from the casino and was feeding the farel cats.. was happening from 43rd ave to less then 1\2 way to 45 ave.
Summary: looked like a rectangle. then an s, then a sauser, kept changing colors, seemed to go back and forth and up and down over an area of about like from 43rd ave and about 1/2 way to 45ave.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
